members.name: getMyComment
members.description: Get my comment, if it has been created

members.name: getAgentComment

parameters.name: agentPubKey
parameters.description: the agent to get the comment for

members.description: Get the comment for the given agent, if they have created it

members.name: getAgentsComments

parameters.name: agentPubKeys
parameters.description: the agents to get the comment for

members.description: Get the comments for the given agent

members.name: searchComments

parameters.name: nicknamePrefix
parameters.description: must be of at least 3 characters

members.description: Search comments that start with nicknamePrefix

members.name: getAllComments
members.description: Get the comments for all the agents in the DHT

members.name: createComment
members.description: Create my comment

members.name: updateComment
members.description: Update my comment

members.name: _service
members.description: Private

members.name: myAgentPubKey
members.description: Static info

members.name: knownComments
members.description: Readable stores

members.name: fetchAllComments
members.description:
Fetches the comments for all agents in the DHT

You can subscribe to `knowComments` to get updated with all the comments when this call is done

Warning! Can be very slow

members.name: fetchAgentComment
members.description: Fetches the comment for the given agent

members.name: fetchAgentsComments
members.description:
Fetches the comments for the given agents in the DHT

You can subscribe to knowComments to get updated with all the comments when this call is done

Use this over `fetchAgentComment` when fetching multiple comments, as it will be more performant

members.name: fetchMyComment
members.description:
Fetch my comment

You can subscribe to `myComment` to get updated with my comment

members.name: searchComments

parameters.name: nicknamePrefix
parameters.description: must be of at least 3 characters

members.description: Search the comments for the agent with nicknames starting with the given nicknamePrefix

members.name: createComment
members.description:
Create my comment

Note that there is no guarantee on nickname uniqness

members.name: updateComment
members.description: Update my comment
